ComicInfo.Summary:
The penultimate issue of Aliens Vs. Zombies is here! When a meteor carrying the Zombie virus hits Earth it triggers the potential end of mankind. The last chance for humanity is the spacecraft full of Alien scientists tasked with eliminating the interstellar virus.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Jason Metcalf & Wes Hartman | 1 | B | Cover B | Anthony Spay & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C | Cover C | Giuseppe Cafaro & Sean Ellery | 3 | D | Cover D | Ed Anderson | 4 | Note: The digital edition (10/28/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/aliens-vs-zombies-4/4000-504513/
ComicInfo.Title: Zombies
